column4: I've got a problem mounting a usb stick on a new lucid installation--anyone able to help me for a bit?
what do you need help on
thanks. The stick mounts on one ubuntu installation, but it won't automount on an old laptop that I just installed lucid on
The stick shows up in gparted, but not on the desktop, and not in /media
Did you use the USB creator in lucid to make it?
try ejecting it and putting it back in, that normally works for me
when a usb isnt  being detected
No, it's just data. An NTFS partition and a ext4 partition
Should be a way to force mount it
Thanks. I'll check that out. Back in a bit.
